overview: This is a documentary about the life and work of Atahualpa del Cioppo, one of the outstanding figures in Uruguayan and Latin American theatre. We are shown his life today, his old friends and his passion for the theatre, against the backdrop of his home, the city of Montevideo.

production_companies.name: Departamento de Cultura de la Intendencia Municipal de Montevideo

title: Atahualpa, Bird of Fulfilment
